entry.title: Sunday: A few flurries. High 10 except 6 along parts of the coast.
entry.summary: A few flurries or periods of drizzle ending this morning then a mix of sun and cloud. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming southwest 20 gusting to 40 this afternoon. High 10 except 6 along parts of the coast. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:30 AM NDT Sunday 7 May 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 2. POP 40%
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy this evening. 40 percent chance of showers overnight. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low plus 2. Forecast issued 5:30 AM NDT Sunday 7 May 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of showers. High 9. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of showers in the morning. A few showers beginning near noon. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming south 30 gusting to 50 in the afternoon. High 9. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 5:30 AM NDT Sunday 7 May 2023
